      • matches

        public static boolean matches​(GenericFilter target,
                              java.lang.String... filters)

        Checks strings against a given GenericFilter.

        Parameters:
        target - The given filter of type GenericFilter
        filters - A list of String representations to be checked against the given filter
        Returns:
        true if one of the strings matches the given filter, false otherwise

      • matches

        public static boolean matches​(VerbConjugationFilter target,
                              java.lang.String... filters)

        Checks strings against a given VerbConjugationFilter.

        Parameters:
        target - The given filter of type VerbConjugationFilter
        filters - A list of String representations to be checked against the given filter
        Returns:
        true if one of the strings matches the given filter, false otherwise

      • fromString

        public static VerbConjugationFilter fromString​(java.lang.String string)

        Converts a String representation into a VerbConjugationFilter value, if possible.

        Parameters:
        string - The representation to be converted
        Returns:
        The VerbConjugationFilter value corresponding to the given string representation

      • asFilterList

        public static java.util.List<VerbConjugationFilter> asFilterList​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> stringFilters)

        Converts a list of String representations into a list of VerbConjugationFilter values. For each String of the list, returns a VerbConjugationFilter value if possible.

        Parameters:
        string - A list of string representations to be converted
        Returns:
        A list of VerbConjugationFilter values converted from the string representations
